content.text: I'm not very good at it either. I think it's because I'm too honest.
I'm also obsessed with filming. I love taking pictures and videos of everything.
I like filming too, but I'm not very good at it. I usually end up getting motion sickness.
I love to put a smile on people's faces. I think it's the best feeling in the world.
Me too! I love making people laugh. It's so much fun.
Sometimes people worry I'm crazy, but I don't think so. I just like to have fun.
I don't think you're crazy. I think you're just a little different. And that's okay.
Thanks. I try not to think about death. It freaks me out.
I don't think about it either. It's not something I want to think about.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go to the gym and work out. I also like to cook healthy meals. I enjoy dating women. And I like to go out to the bars with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to go to the gym too. I don't really cook, but I like to eat healthy meals. I also like to go out to the bars with my friends.
That's cool. It sounds like we have a lot in common.
We do. I think we're going to be friends.
